title: Ep. 28 Dirty Laundry Part 1
description:
Kiki and Medinah have been through some THANGS!

To top it off, imagine dropping YOUR boyfriend's out of town girlfriend off to his house while you're part time uber driving...

It goes there.

Some men ain't sh*t.

But thanks for the stories for this episode

Please take this survey so we can get better ads and bring a better show!

https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/V6RCSQ5

Ella Eyre "Comeback" is the song to download

Use code "CDDPODCAST" for a discount when you download the Lyft app

Checkout www.hellofresh.com and use code "COCKTAL" (that's not a typo) for $40 off your first box of fresh meals.
